name: Html.Form.Input

aliases.name: Element
aliases.comment: All inputs will be defined by this basic structure
aliases.type: { a | id : String, label : String, helpBlock : Maybe.Maybe String, value : Maybe.Maybe v, hasError : Bool, onValue : v -> Signal.Message, onError : e -> Signal.Message }

aliases.name: FormElement
aliases.comment: An element with de and encoder
aliases.type: Html.Form.Input.Element v e { a | decoder : String -> Result.Result e v, encoder : v -> String }

aliases.name: InputElement
aliases.comment: Spec for an input with a type

aliases.name: SelectElement
aliases.type: Html.Form.Input.FormElement v e { choices : List v, displayChoice : v -> String }

values.name: formGroup
values.type: (Html.Form.Input.FormElement v e a -> Html.Html) -> Html.Form.Input.FormElement v e a -> Html.Html
